errorMsg:
Your branch name doesn't respect the established convention.
âž¡️ Please respect the following format: (feat|fix|docs|style|refactor|test|perf|build|ci|chore|revert)/[FEATURE_NAME]

🤖 Interactive: Use the script `pnpm run script:create-branch`
🫱🏻 Manual: You can change the name of your branch with the command `git branch -m NEW_NAME`
